type.name: FindIndex
type.summary:
Finds time series index on a specific date.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: First index in the series of the date specified or -1 if not found.

type.name: FindIndexChain
type.summary: Finds Date/Value tuple index on a specific date.
type.returns: First index in the series of the date specified or -1 if not found.

type.name: Prune
type.summary:
Removes a specific quantity from the beginning of the time series list.
See documentation for more information.
type.param: Exact quantity to remove from the beginning of the series.
